name: Overview
data: [{"id":"473c2679-ecf2-41a5-a67a-dc038f769950","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":1,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"simple.py","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"11461b6f-d150-4b50-9826-a1fe9968e6c2","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":2,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Overview","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3dd11d9c-3514-4529-9095-b59435e1e0db","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"simple.py","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" file defines a lightweight formatter implementation used to normalize the output of a code generation component. It acts as a thin wrapper that converts generated data into a plain Python dictionary structure suitable for downstream processing or serialization.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3432c180-e492-4fed-a6e3-8d0e289841cb","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This module relies on a shared ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"BaseFormatter","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" interface to ensure consistency with other formatter implementations in the system. It is intended for scenarios where minimal transformation is required and clarity of output structure is preferred.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3e9b7303-081c-40a3-bf3d-cbf1ed86b241","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":2,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Contents","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3693e50e-010d-4df1-b133-9b369c224798","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Simple","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": A formatter class that provides a straightforward transformation of generator output into a dictionary of lists.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"475cb9be-e05c-4d57-b452-f902ea7d7237","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":2,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Usage","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"687d9519-129c-45e7-a468-29ec4dfe3f85","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The formatter is designed to be instantiated with a code generator instance and used to produce normalized output. Detailed behavior of the class and its methods is documented separately in their respective documentation.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"30763fb2-c053-48e7-aa0b-b460c823bc62","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":2,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Dependencies","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"6e56ca1e-e714-409a-8bb8-bc346848cfeb","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"BaseFormatter","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":": Provides the base interface and shared behavior for all formatter implementations.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"bddd2f7f-0dc3-49f7-b3eb-389bb1319b82","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":2,"isToggleable":false},"content":[],"children":[]},{"id":"68af18f1-7e3e-4c9e-86cf-05ba751d1f09","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
